text: I kogato Talut potegli s voĭskite, reche: “Allakh vi izpitva s edna reka. Koĭto pie ot neya, toĭ ne e s men, a s men e onzi, koĭto ne ya vkusi, sŭshto i onzi, koĭto zagrebe s rŭka samo edna shepa.” No pikha ottam, osven maltsina izmezhdu tyakh. A shtom ya pregazikha - toĭ i povyarvalite s nego, - rekokha: “Dnes sme bezsilni pred Dzhalut i voĭskite mu.” A onezi, koito se nadyavakha na sreshtata s Allakh, rekokha: “Kolko malki druzhini sa nadvivali mnogobroĭni s pozvolenieto na Allakh! Allakh e s tŭrpelivite.”
